metadata.title: Farmland values and bidder behaviour in first-price land auctions

data_sources.description: The dataset includes all BVVG auctions from January 3, 2007, to July 17, 2015, covering all Eastern Federal States of Germany. It contains information on winning bids, total number of bidders, auction dates, locations, plot-specific land characteristics (including a soil quality index), lot size, number of parcels, and type of usage. It also includes bidder characteristics such as legal status, former tenant status, and foreign involvement.

assessment.findability_reason: The dataset is specific to BVVG auctions and may not be easily accessible without direct contact with BVVG.
assessment.accessibility_reason: The data is restricted and provided by BVVG, indicating limited public access.
assessment.interoperability_reason: The data format and standards are not specified, which may limit interoperability.
assessment.reusability_reason: The dataset is specific to a particular region and time period, with restricted access and unspecified licensing, limiting its reusability.
